de:
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.
Experience with ETL processes and data pipeline development.
Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) and data warehousing solutions.
Understanding of database management systems (SQL and NoSQL).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills for data architecture.
Knowledge of data modeling and schema design.
Experience with data integration tools (e.g., Apache NiFi, Talend).
Ability to optimize data storage and retrieval for performance.
ai:
Proficiency in programming languages like Python or R, and frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Experience with machine learning algorithms and deep learning models.
Familiarity with data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques.
Understanding of AI deployment and model evaluation.
Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities.
Knowledge of natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision techniques.
Experience with version control for machine learning models.
Ability to collaborate with data scientists and software engineers.
ds_da:
Proficiency in programming languages, statistical analysis, and machine learning algorithms.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Understanding of databases and data warehousing concepts.
Experience working with large datasets and performing data analysis.
Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities.
Familiarity with A/B testing and experimental design.
Ability to communicate insights effectively to stakeholders.
Experience in building predictive models and conducting data-driven research.
dev:
Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Bash, Python) and automation tools.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and version control systems (e.g., Git).
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Understanding of system monitoring and performance optimization.
Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
Experience with infrastructure as code (e.g., Terraform, Ansible).
Ability to implement security best practices in deployment.
Knowledge of networking concepts and protocols.
qa:
Proficiency in testing frameworks and automation tools (e.g., Selenium, JUnit).
Experience with manual and automated testing methodologies.
Familiarity with bug tracking and test management tools.
Understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies.
Strong analytical thinking and attention to detail.
Ability to design and execute comprehensive test plans.
Experience with performance and load testing tools.
Knowledge of API testing and validation.
pm:
Experience in product lifecycle management and strategy development.
Strong understanding of market research and user feedback analysis.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, design, marketing).
Proficiency in product roadmapping and prioritization techniques.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to drive product success.
Experience with agile methodologies and project management tools.
Ability to define and measure key performance indicators (KPIs).
Skills in stakeholder management and communication.
ux_ui:
Proficiency in design tools (e.g., Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma).
Experience with user research methodologies and usability testing.
Strong understanding of user experience principles and design systems.
Ability to create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs.
Strong analytical thinking to inform design decisions.
Familiarity with responsive design and accessibility standards.
Experience in collaborating with developers for design implementation.
Ability to iterate designs based on user feedback.
ts:
Experience in analyzing client needs and delivering technical solutions.
Proficiency in relevant technologies and methodologies in the industry.
Ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Strong project management skills and experience with client engagement.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to drive strategic initiatives.
Experience in developing and delivering presentations to clients.
Knowledge of industry trends and best practices.
Ability to create detailed project documentation and reports.
swe:
Proficiency in programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, C++).
Experience with frameworks (e.g., React, Django).
Familiarity with databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB).
Experience with debugging, testing, and version control (e.g., Git).
Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS) and CI/CD pipelines.
Experience with RESTful APIs and containerization (e.g., Docker).
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
